@midasIIITD performance in OffensEval 2019 (SemEval 2019 - Task 6).

In subtask-A, we came 5th out of 103 teams
In subtask-B, we came 8th out of 75 teams
We are very close to best results.

1 paper in main conference, 1 paper in EAAI, 2 papers published in student abstract and poster sessions.

@midasIIITD Lab is pleased to share our novel work titled, Harnessing GANs for Addition of New Classes in VSR (https://t.co/SdFNLNP2PR). 

We present a novel approach to low-shot learning that uses the idea of imagination over unseen classes in a classification problem setting.
